MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the EH46 postcode area of West Linton, affecting properties in Blythe Bridge and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of power issues in the area and only became aware of it at 5.58pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7pm on Saturday 6th February 2021.
